pullRequest.title: [MO] - [2nd-3rd step paralelism] -> templates, re-worked resources, re-writed ∀ tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Type of change

Enhancement / new feature
Refactoring

Description
This PR introducing parallel execution of system tests on the method level. The whole code is re-worked:

Change of ResourceMananger -  2 base stacks (method, class) are re-worked to map of stacks that hold every test resource and after the test is complete then delete all
Change of Resources - methods, which were used for creating some resources were moved to ResourceNameTemplates.java
Change system test API for resources - every kind of resources is now encapsulated and only the resource manager can create a resource based on a specific template


Old API

ResourceName.specificResource()


New API

resourceManager.create(testContext, ResourceNameTemplate.specificTemlate()..)



Checklist

 Write tests
 Make sure all tests pass
 Update documentation
